lead_paragraph: An official in Congo says more than 180 children will soon be able to join their adoptive parents abroad, including 37 who have been adopted by American families.

headline.main: Congo Approves Another 180 Stalled Foreign Adoptions
headline.print_headline: Congo Approves Another 180 Stalled Foreign Adoptions

snippet: An official in Congo says more than 180 children will soon be able to join their adoptive parents abroad, including 37 who have been adopted by American families.
